title: Trump Threatens Tariffs on Countries Aligned With BRICS Nations
summary: President Trump said nations that support the group’s “Anti-American policies” would face an additional 10 percent tariff. He did not elaborate.

title: Canada Shipping Natural Gas to Asia as It Looks Beyond the US for Trade
summary: A tanker is headed to South Korea with a first shipment of liquefied natural gas from Canada, which hopes to reduce its export reliance on its neighbor.

title: A Desperate Search for Survivors of the Central Texas Floods Presses Ahead
summary: Officials, emergency crews and volunteers in Central Texas were holding out hope for finding survivors of the flash flooding, as the death toll climbed.

title: Officials Feared Flood Risk to Youth Camps but Rejected Warning System
summary: Kerr County had discussed buying such things as water gauges and sirens after previous flood disasters. But as with many rural Texas counties, cost was an issue.

title: What’s at Stake as Netanyahu and Trump Meet in Washington
summary: With the fighting in Iran over, President Trump is considering whether to pursue a new nuclear agreement with Tehran. He is also urging a new cease-fire deal to end the fighting in Gaza.

title: Where Do Israel-Hamas Cease-Fire Negotiations Stand?
summary: Hamas wants a guarantee that negotiations will lead to a permanent end to the Gaza war.

title: How Trump’s Cuts Hurt Kansas Farmers, From Food Aid to Dog Chow
summary: Kansans created Food for Peace, for 70 years a font of rural income and pride. Now at least one grain broker is trying to sell grain that once fed the world as dog food.

title: Medical Societies Sue Kennedy and H.H.S. Over Vaccine Advice
summary: New restrictions on Covid shots run counter to scientific evidence, the groups said.

title: Trial Over Free Speech on Campus, and Trump’s Student Crackdown, Begins
summary: The case challenges the Trump administration’s targeting of noncitizen student activists for arrest and deportation on First Amendment grounds.

title: How a Show About Truly Terrible People Became the Defining American Sitcom
summary: Over the last 20 years, television has changed, but the malignant narcissists of “It’s Always Sunny in Philadelphia” have not.

title: Will A.I. Replace New Hires or Middle Managers?
summary: Amid layoffs at Microsoft and other large tech companies, experts are debating whose jobs are most likely to be spared.

title: Your Job Interviewer Is Not a Person. It’s A.I.
summary: You thought artificial intelligence was coming for your job? First, it’s coming for your job interviewer.

title: Ukrainian Troops Struggle to Hold the Line on the Eastern Front
summary: Kyiv is defending Kostiantynivka from Russian drone attacks. The embattled city is a gateway to Ukraine’s last major defense in the Donetsk region.

title: Russian Minister Who Had Led Region Later Invaded by Ukraine Is Found Dead
summary: Roman V. Starovoyt, the transport minister, had governed Russia’s western Kursk region before Ukrainian forces invaded in 2024 and occupied part of the territory.

title: Ukraine Turns to Fishing Nets to Catch Russian Drones
summary: With their dense mesh, the nets can tangle drone propellers. It’s a simple but effective countermeasure that reflects how low-tech means can blunt high-tech weapons in the war.

title: Tesla Stock Dives as Elon Musk Plans New Political Party
summary: Mr. Musk’s involvement in politics was once seen by investors as a benefit to Tesla. Not anymore.

title: Trump Says Musk Is ‘Off the Rails’ With New Political Party Effort
summary: The tech billionaire’s effort to create a new political party, called the America Party, comes amid a ramped-up feud with the president over his new domestic policy law.

title: Erin Patterson Is Found Guilty of Murder in Australia Mushroom Poisoning Case
summary: Three people died in 2023 after eating beef Wellington made by Erin Patterson, whose subsequent trial gripped the country.

title: The Ruthless Ambition of Stephen Miller
summary: The most powerful man in the West Wing is getting what he wants. Is Trump?

title: You Don’t Have to Be a Doctor to Understand This
summary: The moral argument for global health is the strongest we have.

title: Your Questions, Answered
summary: We address your queries about the news.

title: Man Who Opened Fire on Texas Border Patrol Building Is Fatally Shot
summary: The man opened fire on the building in McAllen, Texas, on Monday. A border patrol employee and two officers were injured, federal officials said.

title: Iran Carries Out Mass Expulsion of Afghan Refugees
summary: About 800,000 people have been deported to Afghanistan, a desperately poor country, under an Iranian campaign that accelerated sharply in June.

title: What Happens When Most of the Adults in Boys’ Lives Are Women
summary: Jobs working with children are largely done by women, leaving many boys, especially in low-income areas, with few men as role models.

title: South African Police’s Frequent Use of Torture Echoes Apartheid’s Brutality
summary: A government led by freedom fighters who helped to liberate the country more than 30 years ago is now overseeing a police force accused of staggering abuses.
